com.xlab.glodocs.api.db
Class Collection

java.lang.Object
  com.xlab.glodocs.api.db.Collection

public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object

Class represents single Collection in Database Can be used to work with Documents in Collection

Author:
Lapitskiy Anton
